"A.P.241/11/10": "Hey, <%me>. You seem busy as ever."
"More like you're never busy with anything. Whatever happened to teaching, huh?"
"Not my fault. Old man Regias and Maria are doing too good a job, nothin' I can do about it."
"Ahh, is Maria still ignoring General Affairs for the Instruction Sector? Sara won't be happy about that."
"Oh, Xiera. Is it alright for you to leave the bridge?"
"Yes! I got permission to leave because of everything that's been happening!"
"Now that you mention it, you've been the one contacting us for the Commander meetings too, haven't you?"
"Ya know, I've been wondering why you've been tagging along at those meetings for a while now."
"Because you never document anything. I am a reliable secretary, you see."
"Hmm. Seeing you both in person like this, I can't help wondering."
"Wondering what?"
"Zeno and Echo. Why haven't you two gotten married yet?"
"Bwuh!"
"Good question"
"It's one of the Seven Wonders of ARKS"
"See? Everyone else feels the same way. It's all I can think, seeing you together."
"No-, I mean, marriage?! You have to work up to that slowly..."
"You two seem like you've worked all the way up to it."
"But... Bu-But, it needs to be done when the time is right, and you have to be totally sure, yeah!"
"'Kay. Let's get married then."
"Hu-What?!"
"What? You don't wanna?"
"N-Nonononono! I mean...I do!"
"But are you... okay? I mean, with getting married... to me..."
"What are you all self-conscious about now? I mean, who've I got besides you?"
"You okay with it? You'll be able to boss me around as much as you want from now on."
"...I already do."
"Yeah, you sure do."
"O-Okay! Let's go fill out the paperwork, Zeno! Before I change my mind!"
"You'd change it that easily? Well, see ya later. And thanks, Xiera."
"...Um, <%me>. Did... I just do something unthinkable?!"
"You're something else"
"I think it's great"
"No, but... I couldn't stop myself from saying it after seeing them like that...!"
"I suppose it is, but... I didn't imagine everything would come together so quickly..."
"Ahh!... I just felt a huge wave of embarrassment! We witnessed something amazing! Spectacular, even!"
